item.title: How I Made This
item.description: Image credit: James Harrison / Unsplash There are no shortage of front-end frameworks, no-code website builders, and website templates available. Each has their strengths and weaknesses, and I’ve used almost all of them: Wix, Squarespace, React, Vue, Bootstrap, to name a few. On my previous personal websites, I would use a template like this and customize it. However, this approach does not lend itself to making a blog, where content needs to be served dynamically.
